title.native: ムヒョとロージーの魔法律相談事務所
title.romaji: Muhyo to Rouji no Mahouritsu Soudan Jimusho
title.english: Muhyo & Roji's Bureau of Supernatural Investigation

description:
Are you a victim of unwanted spirit possession? Is there a ghost you need sent up and away...or down to burn for all eternity? If the answer is yes, then you need Muhyo and Roji, experts in magic law. Serving justice to evil spirits is their specialty.

(Source: Viz Media)

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Ghost
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

title.native: ムヒョとロージーの魔法律相談事務所

node.description:
SCREEN mode is a unit formed by sound producer Masatomo Ohta and voice actor Yuu Hayashi.

[Website](http://screenmode.net/)
Animator, character designer and illustrator affiliated with [Craftar](https://anilist.co/studio/6156).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1314120680091209728)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/154741/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1314120680091209728)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/154741/)._

**Residency:** Nerima, Tokyo, Japan
**Graduated:** Meiji University

**[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/tr.netamemo)** | **[Twitter](https://twitter.com/netamemo)**

**Yoshie Terushige** is a Japanese producer who works for the company Lantis.

[Website](http://www.orsm.jp/) | [Profile (Sinsekai Studio)](https://sinsekaistudio.jp/artist/oresama/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/o_oresama)

ORESAMA is a musical duo that has been active since 2014. Their music is a mix of 80's disco, funk and electro. 

They are currently affiliated with Sinsekai Studio.

**Members:**
- [Pon](https://anilist.co/staff/301227/) (Lead Vo., Lyricist)
-  [Hideya Kojima](https://anilist.co/staff/158432) (Vo., Trackmaker)

Affiliated with Mouse.

He is described by his colleagues as someone very efficient with his line work, particularly the speed at which he can make corrections.

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 6 - The Butterfly of the Night
